messages.message:
to my knowledge, <mailto:support-testing@instabase.com|support-testing@instabase.com> is supposed to be a site admin on all environments (at least this is how we use this account in our automated tests)

This account is a site admin on dogfood.instabase.com (http://dogfood.instabase.com) and uat.dogfood.instabase.com (http://uat.dogfood.instabase.com), but itâ€™s not an admin on instabase.com (http://instabase.com). Can a site admin on instabase.com (http://instabase.com) fix this so that this test account has the same permissions across all environments?

cc @Nikolaos Kofinas
curious :eyes: - what kind of tests do we need to run on prod?
ibformers hits prod for CI tests, (publishing and unpublishing models)
thanks! the ibformers CI test should work using a oauth token associated with that account then @Nikolaos Kofinas
